mapper.sql: SELECT m_prj_invoice.id, m_prj_invoice.createdTime, m_prj_invoice.lastUpdatedTime, m_prj_invoice.createdUser, m_prj_invoice.assignUser, m_prj_invoice.amount, m_prj_invoice.currentId, m_prj_invoice.clientId, m_prj_invoice.contactUserFullName, m_prj_invoice.sAccountId, m_prj_invoice.status, m_prj_invoice.note, m_prj_invoice.type, m_prj_invoice.noId, m_prj_invoice.projectId, m_prj_invoice.description, m_prj_invoice.issuedate, m_client.id AS client_id, m_client.name AS client_name, m_client.website AS client_website, m_client.phoneOffice AS client_phoneOffice, m_client.fax AS client_fax, m_client.billingAddress AS client_billingAddress, m_client.city AS client_city, m_client.postalCode AS client_postalCode, m_client.state AS client_state, concat(createUserTbl.firstname, ' ', createUserTbl.lastname) AS createUserFullName, createUserTbl.avatarId AS createUserAvatarId, concat(assignUserTbl.firstname, ' ', assignUserTbl.lastname) AS assignUserFullName, assignUserTbl.avatarId AS assignUserAvatarId FROM m_prj_invoice LEFT OUTER JOIN m_client ON (m_client.id = m_prj_invoice.clientId) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user AS createUserTbl ON (m_prj_invoice.createdUser = createUserTbl.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user AS assignUserTbl ON (m_prj_invoice.assignUser = assignUserTbl.username)
